name: giri-rest-api
description: Specification of the giri garden irrigator REST API endpoints

hooks.pre-commit: npm run prettier && npm run swagger

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run swagger && npm run prettier
scripts.swagger: swagger-cli validate rest-api/api.yml && swagger-cli bundle rest-api/api.yml -o docs/swagger.json && redoc-cli bundle rest-api/api.yml -o docs/redoc-static.html
scripts.all: npm run swagger && npm run prettier
